featured_projects.name: AI Construction Takeoff
featured_projects.description: AI-powered web application to automate construction takeoffs by analyzing architectural drawings for measurement, classification and annotation. Built interactive React UI and integrated Django APIs with OpenCV and PostgreSQL for AI-driven measurement and collaboration.

featured_projects.name: Hydrovac Industrial E-Commerce
featured_projects.description: E-commerce platform for hydrovac and jetting equipment parts with vendor support, streamlined ordering and secure payments. Implemented responsive Next.js UI, Tailwind styling, Stripe integration and Prisma/PostgreSQL-driven product operations.

featured_projects.name: Driver Improvement Course LMS
featured_projects.description: A 12-hour state-approved Advanced Driver Improvement (ADI) learning platform with interactive modules, assessments and certification tracking. Frontend in React with Laravel APIs and MySQL-backed progress tracking.

featured_projects.name: University Seating & Attendance System
featured_projects.description: Web-based seating and attendance management for classrooms to support cohorting, contact tracing and safe operations. Built Vue.js seating UI and Laravel APIs for cohort and seat management with MySQL persistence.

featured_projects.name: Aviation E-Learning Platform
featured_projects.description: FAA-focused e-learning platform for pilot training with video lessons, quizzes and mastery-based progress tracking. Implemented responsive Angular front-end, Laravel backend APIs and integrations with Infusionsoft/Keap for CRM/workflows.

featured_projects.name: Blockchain Supply-Chain Ecosystem
featured_projects.description: Decentralized supply-chain platform with secure document exchange, IoT shipment tracking, member governance and a token-based B2B marketplace. Built React/Next frontends, Node/Express APIs, Hyperledger Fabric and Web3 integrations with MongoDB reporting.

featured_projects.name: Medizura
featured_projects.description: Clinic and hospital operations platform for online appointments, video consultations, digital prescriptions and patient records. Built dynamic Angular frontends, Laravel REST APIs and Elasticsearch-backed search to optimize patient workflows.

featured_projects.name: PhotoFacet
featured_projects.description: PhotoFacet is a photo management application that organizes, edits, and shares images with AI-driven face recognition to simplify searching and management. Key features include seamless photo organization, AI face recognition, editing and sharing tools, and a smooth, efficient workflow for individuals and organizations.
